record.methods:
PROCEDURE Destroy *!* destroy
_inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
mr_findfilechange_cancel(thisform.mr_iguid)
ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
Local iguid
if not empty(thisform.p1)
m.iguid = thisform.p1
else
m.iguid = _inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', '00000000')
endif
thisform.mr_setinstance(m.iguid) ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_deletemod *!* mr_deletemod
*!* DISABLED FFC MONITORING FOR THE OPERATION
local cbackfolder, cfile, nselect, omod, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2 local pifolder, piguid, pldesc, pmodid, result
replace mr_instances.ffci with 1 in 'mr_instances'
m.cfile = addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + mr_mods.filename1
if _file(m.cfile) and messagebox('DELETE ' + mr_mods.filename1 + '?', 1+256+48, 'MODROBOT') = 1
m.cbackfolder = addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + '..\mods.backup'
_apicreatedirectory(m.cbackfolder, 0)
_apicopyfile(m.cfile, addbs(m.cbackfolder) + mr_mods.filename1, 0)
m.result = _apideletefile(m.cfile)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = mr_mods.filename1 m.pfilename2 = '' m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'DELETED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
m.nselect = select()
scatter blank name m.omod
m.omod.iguid = '00000000' m.omod.fguid = '00000000' m.omod.rguid = '0000000000000000'
gather name m.omod
_restorearea(m.nselect)
endif
endif
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledoff *!* mr_enabledoff
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'JAR'
m.filenameo = mr_mods1.filename1
m.filenamen = mr_mods1.filename1 + '.disabled'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'DISABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods1.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.ena with .f. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
endscan
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledon *!* mr_enabledon
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'DISABLED'
m.filenameo = mr_mods1.filename1
m.filenamen = juststem(juststem(mr_mods1.filename1)) + '.jar'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'ENABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods1.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.ena with .t. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
endscan
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledtoggle *!* mr_enabledtoggle
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
*!* DISABLED FFC MONITORING FOR THE OPERATION
replace mr_instances.ffci with 1 in 'mr_instances'
m.result = 0
do case
case upper(justext(mr_mods.filename1)) = 'JAR'
m.filenameo = mr_mods.filename1
m.filenamen = mr_mods.filename1 + '.disabled'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'DISABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods' replace mr_mods.ena with .f. in 'mr_mods'
endif
case upper(justext(mr_mods.filename1)) = 'DISABLED'
m.filenameo = mr_mods.filename1
m.filenamen = juststem(juststem(mr_mods.filename1)) + '.jar'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'ENABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods' replace mr_mods.ena with .t. in 'mr_mods'
endif
endcase
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_modupdatescan *!* mr_modupdatescan
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and mr_mods1.upd = .t.
doevents
mr_modupdate(mr_mods1.rguid)
endscan ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* mr_setinstance
lparameters piguid
*!* CANCEL FINDFILECHANGE OF PREVIOUS INSTANCE
mr_findfilechange_cancel(thisform.mr_iguid)
if m.piguid = '00000000' and reccount('mr_instances') > 0 then
go top in 'mr_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = mr_instances.iguid
else
thisform.mr_iguid = m.piguid
endif
if seek(thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .t.
*!* START MONITORING FOLDER
mr_findfilechange_init(thisform.mr_iguid)
set filter to mr_mods.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid in 'mr_mods'
if empty(mr_instances.iname) then
thisform.caption = 'MODS - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iguid, 240)
else
thisform.caption = 'MODS - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iname, 240)
endif
else
thisform.setall('ENABLED', .f.)
thisform.tbinstances.enabled = .t.
thisform.caption = 'MODS - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
set filter to mr_mods.iguid == '99999999' in 'mr_mods'
endif
go top in 'mr_mods'
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_updatetoggle replace mr_mods.upd with not mr_mods.upd in 'mr_mods'
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui *!* updateui
local icaption, sep
if seek(mr_mods.aid, 'mr_addons', 'aid') = .t.
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = mr_addons.avatar
else
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = mr_mods.guidicon
endif
if mr_mods.ena = .t.
thisform.tbena.pictureval = thisform.tbena.tbpicturevalchecked
else
thisform.tbena.pictureval = thisform.tbena.tbpicturevalunchecked
endif
if mr_mods.upd = .t.
thisform.tbupd.pictureval = thisform.tbena.tbpicturevalchecked
else
thisform.tbupd.pictureval = thisform.tbena.tbpicturevalunchecked
endif
m.sep = space(3)
m.icaption = ' ' + ; 'GUID: ' + mr_instances.iguid + m.sep + ; 'NAME: ' + mr_instances.iname + m.sep + ; 'VERSION ' + mr_instances.iminecraft + m.sep + ; 'LOADER: ' + mr_instances.iloader + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + mr_instances.gver1 + m.sep + ; 'MAXVER: ' + mr_instances.gver2 + m.sep + ; 'PATH: '
m.icaption = m.icaption + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 255 - len(m.icaption))
thisform.lblinstance.caption = m.icaption
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 28 Top = 324 Width = 1296 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Anchor = 15 Height = 276 HighlightRow = .T. Left = 12 RecordSource = "mr_mods" TabIndex = 27 Top = 36 Width = 1452 HighlightStyle = 0 _gridcontextmenulang = en autowidth = .F. Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange lparameters nColIndex
this.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE DblClick thisform.mr_enabledtoggle() ENDPROC PROCEDURE getdynamicbackcolor lparameters pocolum as column
*!* http://materialuicolors.co/?utm_source=launchers
local ncolor
do case
case mr_mods.fid1 # 0 and mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
m.ncolor = _hsl(60, 90, 90)
case mr_mods.ena = .f.
m.ncolor = _hsl(300, 90, 90)
case mr_mods.fid1 = 0
m.ncolor = _hsl(0, 90, 90)
otherwise
m.ncolor = this.columnbackcolor
endcase
return m.ncolor
ENDPROC PROCEDURE opencontextmenu Local choice
this.ContextMenu.clear()
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN')
mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid)
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'GOOGLEIT', 'Google file name') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILENAME', 'Copy file name') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYCFURL', 'Copy project URL') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILE1URL', 'Copy file 1 URL') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILE2URL', 'Copy file 2 URL')
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-')
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'TOGGLEENABLED', 'Toggle enabled') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'TOGGLEUPDATE', 'Toggle update')
*!* If mr_mods.aid > 0
*!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', Sys(2015), '-') *!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', 'CURSE_OVERVIEW', 'Curse Overview') *!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', 'CURSE_FILES', 'Curse Files')
*!* Endif
*!* Endif
m.choice = this.ContextMenu.show()
do case
case m.choice = 'GOOGLEIT'
mr_shellexecute('https://www.google.com/search?q="' + mr_mods.filename1 + '"')
case m.choice = 'COPYFILENAME'
_cliptext = mr_mods.filename1
case m.choice = 'COPYCFURL'
if mr_mods.aid > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'COPYFILE1URL'
if mr_mods.fid1 > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'COPYFILE2URL'
if mr_mods.fid1 > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid2)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'TOGGLEENABLED'
thisform.mr_enabledtoggle()
case m.choice = 'TOGGLEUPDATE'
thisform.mr_updatetoggle()
endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 444 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_check_box_black_18dp.png Caption = "ENABLED" TabIndex = 10 ToolTipText = "TOGGLE CURRENT MOD ENABLED" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbena"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* if mr_mods.ena = .t.
*!* this.pictureval = this.tbpicturevalchecked
*!* else
*!* this.pictureval = this.tbpicturevalunchecked
*!* endif
thisform.mr_enabledtoggle() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 420 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_cloud_download_black_18dp.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 9 ToolTipText = "UPDATE CURRENT MOD" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbupdate"
record.methods:

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 336 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_list_alt_black_18dp.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "SELECT MOD FILE VERSION FOR UPDATE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbversions"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local fid
m.fid = 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid2 > 0
Do Form mr_mods_pickfile With mr_mods.fid2 To m.fid
Case mr_mods.fid1 > 0
Do Form mr_mods_pickfile With mr_mods.fid1 To m.fid
Endcase
If m.fid > 0 Then
= Seek(m.fid, 'mr_files', 'fid')
Replace mr_mods.fid2 With mr_files.fid In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filedate2 With mr_files.filedate In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filelen2 With mr_files.filelen In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filename2 With mr_files.filename In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.hash2 With mr_files.hash In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.rtypename2 With mr_files.rtypename In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.gver2 With mr_files.gver In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.loader2 With mr_files.foldername In 'mr_mods'
If mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
Replace mr_mods.hasupd With .T. In 'mr_mods'
Else
Replace mr_mods.hasupd With .F. In 'mr_mods'
Endif
Thisform.updateui()
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
Thisform.gridmain.Refresh()
Endif ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1332 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "OVERVIEW" TabIndex = 23 ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT OVERVIEW URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkhome"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid))
Else
If Not Empty(mr_mods.modid) And Seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .T.
mr_shellexecute(mr_modids.url)
Endif
Endif
ENDPROC

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid1 > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1))
Otherwise
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid))
Endcase
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 228 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_refresh_black_18dp.png Caption = "CURSE" TabIndex = 5 ToolTipText = "REFRESH CURSE DATA FOR ALL MODS" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbgetcursedataall"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
mr_cursedataget(thisform.mr_iguid) mr_cursedatarefresh(thisform.mr_iguid) mr_getmodupdates(thisform.mr_iguid)
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 156 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_autorenew_black_18dp.png Caption = "SCAN" TabIndex = 4 ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbscan"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
if empty(mr_instances.gverlong1) or empty(mr_instances.gverlong2)
messagebox('SELECT MIN AND MAX MINECRAFT VERSIONS WITH "MINVER" AND "MAXVER" BUTTONS', 0 + 64, 'MODROBOT')
return
endif
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
mr_scanmodsfolder(thisform.mr_iguid) mr_cursedatarefresh(thisform.mr_iguid) mr_getmodupdates(thisform.mr_iguid)
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 300 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_refresh_black_18dp.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 6 ToolTipText = "REFRESH CURSE DATA FOR CURRENT MOD" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbgetcursedata"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
mr_cursedataget(mr_mods.iguid, mr_mods.rguid) mr_cursedatarefresh(mr_mods.iguid, mr_mods.rguid) mr_getmodupdates(mr_mods.iguid, mr_mods.rguid)
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1284 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "FOLDER" TabIndex = 22 ToolTipText = "EXPLORE MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbfolder"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click mr_explorerhere(Addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + mr_mods.filename1)
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1404 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "FILE2" TabIndex = 25 ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT FILE URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkfile2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid2 > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid2))
Otherwise
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid))
Endcase
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 936 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "JIJ" TabIndex = 16 ToolTipText = "OPEN JAR IN JAR TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods: PROCEDURE Click do form mr_mods_jij with thisform.mr_iguid ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1440 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 26 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 tbpictureautosize = .F. Name = "tbmenu"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local result, txt
This.tbmenuitemadd(1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Enable All') This.tbmenuitemadd(2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Disable All') This.tbmenuitemadd(3, 0, 1, 0, 0, '-')
This.tbmenuitemadd(4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Generate Markdown mod list') *This.tbmenuitemadd(5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Generate curl mod download list')
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
Do Case
Case m.result = 1
Thisform.mr_enabledon()
Case m.result = 2
Thisform.mr_enabledoff()
Case m.result = 4
mr_genmodlist_markdown(Thisform.mr_iguid)
Case m.result = 5
mr_genmodlist_download(Thisform.mr_iguid)
Endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 528 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_check_box_black_18dp.png Caption = "UPDATE" TabIndex = 11 ToolTipText = "TOGGLE CURRENT MOD UPDATE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbupd"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* if mr_mods.upd = .t.
*!* this.pictureval = this.tbpicturevalchecked
*!* else
*!* this.pictureval = this.tbpicturevalunchecked
*!* endif
thisform.mr_updatetoggle() ENDPROC

record.properties: Anchor = 12 Picture = ..\res\noimage1.png Stretch = 2 Height = 144 Left = 1320 Top = 324 Width = 144 Name = "imgavatar"

Top = 0 Left = 132 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_top_black_18dp.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 3 ToolTipText = "SET THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MOD UPDATES" Name = "tbmaxver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 108 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_bottom_black_18dp.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 2 ToolTipText = "SET THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MOD UPDATES" Name = "tbminver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Caption = "INSTANCES" TabIndex = 1 ToolTipText = "INSTANCES" Name = "tbinstances"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
do form mr_instances ENDPROC PROCEDURE dropdownclick Local iguid, nselect, pitemchecked, result
m.nselect = select()
use 'mr_instances' again in 0 order tag 'INAME' alias 'menu_instances'
select 'menu_instances'
*!* lparameters pitemid, pparentid, pitemtype, pitemchecked, pitemdisabled, pitemcaption, pitempicture
scan
if thisform.mr_iguid == menu_instances.iguid
m.pitemchecked = .t.
else
m.pitemchecked = .f.
endif
this.tbmenuitemadd(recno('menu_instances'), 0, 0, m.pitemchecked, 0, menu_instances.iname + ' - ' + menu_instances.ifolder)
endscan
m.result = this.tbmenushow()
if m.result > 0 then
go m.result in 'menu_instances'
m.iguid = menu_instances.iguid
endif
use in 'menu_instances'
_restorearea(m.nselect)
if m.result > 0 then
thisform.mr_setinstance(m.iguid)
endif ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 612 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "DEL" TabIndex = 12 ToolTipText = "DELETE CURRENT MOD" Name = "_tbcommand5"
record.methods: PROCEDURE Click thisform.mr_deletemod() ENDPROC
